nodes.text: Orrin Loneozner was a male Human unemployed mechanic on Tatooine. He watched the Boonta Eve Classic from Watto's box in 32 BBY. He stood almost directly behind Watto.
Loneozner shared a surname with Laze "Fixer" Loneozner, a fellow Human from Tatooine who was a friend of Luke Skywalker.

Orrin Loneozner first appeared in the 1999 Star Wars film Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. He was first identified in the 2012 Star Wars Insider 131 article "Rogues Gallery: An Audience of Aliens."
